studies.name: Serous Ovarian Cancer (MSK, 2025)
studies.description: Targeted sequencing of 31 Ovarian cancers and their matched normals via MSK-IMPACT platform.

studies.name: Ovarian Serous Cystadenocarcinoma (TCGA, Nature 2011)
studies.description:
Whole exome sequencing of 489 high-grade serous ovarian adenocarcinoma tumor/normal pairs. The Cancer Genome Atlas (TCGA) Serous Ovarian Cancer project. 489 cases.
Raw data via the TCGA Data Portal.

studies.name: Ovarian Serous Cystadenocarcinoma (TCGA, PanCancer Atlas)
studies.description: Ovarian Serous Cystadenocarcinoma TCGA PanCancer data. The original data is here. The publications are here.

studies.name: RAD51B Associated Mixed Cancers (MSK, NPJ Breast Cancer 2021)
studies.description: Targeted sequencing of 19 samples with RAD51B loss-of-function variants and their matched normals. Samples confer susceptibility to hereditary breast and ovarian cancers, resulting in homologous recombination-deficient tumors.
studies.citation: Setton et al. NPJ Breast Cancer 2021

studies.name: MSK MetTropism (MSK, Cell 2021)
studies.description: MSK-MET (Memorial Sloan Kettering - Metastatic Events and Tropisms) is a pan-cancer cohort of tumor genomic and clinical outcome data from 25,000 patients. The dataset identifies associations between tumor genomic alterations and patterns of metastatic dissemination across 50 tumor types; showing that chromosomal instability is strongly correlated with metastatic burden in some tumor types, like prostate and lung adenocarcinomas and HR+/HER2+ breast ductal carcinoma, but not in others, such as colorectal MSS, pancreatic adenocarcinoma and high-grade serous ovarian cancer. The study also identifies somatic alterations associated with increased metastatic burden and routes of metastatic spread. Our data offers a resource for the investigation of the biologic basis for metastatic spread and highlights the role of chromosomal instability in cancer progression. This data is available under the Creative Commons BY-NC-ND 4.0 license.

studies.name: Endometrial and Ovarian Cancer (MSK, Nature Medicine 2024)
studies.description: Targeted sequencing of 33 endometrial and ovarian tumors and their matched normals via MSK-IMPACT.
studies.citation: Friedman, Claire F et al. Nature Medicine 2024

studies.name: High-Grade Serous Ovarian Cancer (MSK, NPJ Genome Med 2021)
studies.description: Targeted Sequencing of 45 Serous Ovarian Cancer tumor/normal pairs from 45 patients.
studies.citation: Elkin et al. NPJ Genome Med 2021

studies.name: Cutaneous Squamous Cell Carcinoma (MD Anderson, Clin Cancer Res 2014)
studies.description: Whole-exome sequencing of tumor/normal pairs from 39 aggressive cutaneous squamous cell carcinoma cases.
studies.citation: Pickering et al. Clin Cancer Res 2014

studies.name: High-Grade Serous Ovarian Cancer (TCGA, GDC)
studies.description: TCGA High-Grade Serous Ovarian Cancer. Source data from GDC and generated in Jul 2025 using Cancer Data Aggregator.

studies.name: Ovarian Cancer (CPTAC GDC, 2025)
studies.description: CPTAC Ovarian Cancer. Source data from NCI GDC and generated in Aug 2025 using Cancer Data Aggregator.

studies.name: Ovarian Cancer (Gray Foundation, Cancer Discov 2024)
studies.description: Microregion transcriptomic data (GeoMx) and multiplex imaging (CyCIF) for High-Grade Serous ovarian Cancer Cases (HGSOC). This resource was supported by the Gray Foundation.

studies.name: Cystic Tumor of the Pancreas (Johns Hopkins, PNAS 2011)
studies.description: Whole-exome sequencing of major neoplastic cyst types of the pancreas: 8 serous cystadenomas (SCAs), 8 intraductal papillary mucinous neoplasms (IPMNs), 8 mucinous cystic neoplasms (MCNs), and 8 solid pseudopapillary neoplasms (SPNs).

studies.name: Ovarian Cancer - MSK SPECTRUM (MSK, Nature 2022)
studies.description: Multi-region, multi-modal profiling of 42 untreated high-grade serous ovarian cancer (HGSOC) tumor/normal pairs. This study reports an integrative analysis of mutational processes and their impact on the tumor microenvironment using single-cell RNA sequencing, whole-genome sequencing, targeted sequencing (MSK-IMPACT), digital histopathology and multiplexed immunofluorescence. The study is part of a prospective research program to understand the spatio-temporal determinants of HGSOC evolution, treatment and response (MSK SPECTRUM: Memorial Sloan Kettering - SPatio-temporal Evolution in Cancer TRaced Using Multimodalities).

studies.name: Ovarian Serous Cystadenocarcinoma (TCGA, Firehose Legacy)
studies.description: TCGA Ovarian Serous Cystadenocarcinoma. Source data from GDAC Firehose. Previously known as TCGA Provisional.

studies.name: Small Cell Carcinoma of the Ovary (MSK, Nat Genet 2014)
studies.description: Targeted sequencing of 12 SCCO paired tumor and normal samples.

studies.name: Low-Grade Serous Ovarian Cancer (MSK, Clin Cancer Res 2022)
studies.description: Characterization of the somatic mutational landscape of MAPK pathway in 119 low-grade serous ovarian carcinomas and their matched normals.
studies.citation: Manning-Geist et al. Clin Cancer Res. 2022
